effect.sun_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage. Heals the user by the target’s current Attack, including modifiers, but not including this move’s Attack-lowering effect. If the target’s Attack is already at -6, this move will fail. In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage. Heals the user by the target’s current Attack, including modifiers, but not including this move’s Attack-lowering effect. If the target’s Attack is already at -6, this move will fail. In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage. Heals the user by the target’s current Attack, including modifiers, but not including this move’s Attack-lowering effect. If the target’s Attack is already at -6, this move will fail. In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.

short_effect.sun_moon: Heals the user by the target’s current Attack stat and lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Heals the user by the target’s current Attack stat and lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Heals the user by the target’s current Attack stat and lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
